member.name: T:System.Data.HashFunction.SpookyHash.ISpookyHashV1
member.summary:
Implementation of SpookyHash V1 as specified at http://burtleburtle.net/bob/hash/spooky.html.
This hash function has been superseded by due to a loss of entropy from a coding error in the original specification. It still passes the hash function tests the creator set for it, but it is preferred that SpookyHash V2 is used.

member.param: Configuration to use when constructing the instance.
